texts.name: Svetlina
texts.biography: Svetlina has a beautiful voice. When she sang, not only people listened to her with bated breath, but also the mysterious creatures of Iria - the sirens descended from the sky to listen to her singing. No one could tame these powerful and proud creatures better than her.

specialty.description: Increases the Attack and Defense skills of Sirins or Alconosts or each level attained after 6th level.
